title: HR Management Competency Enhancement: Digital-Based Islamic Religious Education Module Development Using the 4D Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental Islamic cultural concepts and basic religious practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design digital education modules using the 4D development model (Define, Design, Development, Dissemination)
Learners can explain methods for teaching core practices of Islamic religious education (e.g., Dhuhr prayer) in VR/simulation environments
Learners can develop and improve educational modules incorporating expert feedback for practical classroom application
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
